Package hippodrome

Class RacingTrack

  • java.lang.Object
    • hippodrome.RacingTrack

  • public class RacingTrack
extends java.lang.Object
    Place where the races take place. Here each race is represented by an element of the class Race, described by a given number of tracks, an identification and a distance.
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Hugo Fragata, Rui Lopes

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private boolean brokerDidNotOrderToStartTheRace
      Condition variable for the Broker to order the race to start.
      private int[] currentHorsesPositions
      An array with all the positions of the pairs Horse/Jockeys currently on action.
      private boolean hasFirstHorseCrossedTheFinishLine
      Condition variable for the first pair Horse/Jockey to announce that has crossed the finish line.
      private java.util.Queue<java.lang.Integer> horsesToRun
      A Queue representing the movement order of the pairs Horse/Jockey on field.
      private int numberOfFinishedHorses
      Internal structure correspondent to the horses which have completed the race.
      private Race race
      A representation of a race with an identification, a distance and a number of tracks.
      private boolean raceIsAboutToEnd
      Condition variable for noticing when a race is about to end.
      private GeneralInformationRepository repository
      The GeneralInformationRepository instance where all this region's actions will be reported.
      private int winner
      The current winner of this race as the identification of the pair Horse/Jockey which has crossed the finish line first.

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RacingTrack​(Race race, GeneralInformationRepository repository)
      Creates a Racing Track.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Race getRace​()
      Gets the current Race happening on this Racing Track.
      int getWinner​()
      Gets the current winner of a race on this Racing Track.
      boolean hasFinishLineBeenCrossed​(int horseJockeyId)
      Verification if the pair Horse/Jockey horse has crossed the finish line.
      void makeAMove​(int horseId)
      Let a pair Horse/Jockey horse make a move on the track, accordingly to its abilities to move.
      private void markFinalPosition​(int horse)
      Marks the final position of the pair Horse/Jockey identified with horse.
      void proceedToStartLine​()
      Changes the state of the pair Horse/Jockey to At the Start Line (ATSL) and waits till the last startTheRace() is performed by the Broker.
      void startTheRace​()
      Signal that the race is about to start, by the Broker performing its job.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • race

        private Race race
        A representation of a race with an identification, a distance and a number of tracks. This is made using the class Race.

      • horsesToRun

        private java.util.Queue<java.lang.Integer> horsesToRun
        A Queue representing the movement order of the pairs Horse/Jockey on field. This have an implementation of the LinkedBlockingQueue of Java's Collections Library.

      • numberOfFinishedHorses

        private int numberOfFinishedHorses
        Internal structure correspondent to the horses which have completed the race.

      • currentHorsesPositions

        private int[] currentHorsesPositions
        An array with all the positions of the pairs Horse/Jockeys currently on action.

      • winner

        private int winner
        The current winner of this race as the identification of the pair Horse/Jockey which has crossed the finish line first.
        Note that this winner, if the race is not finished, has its value of -1.

      • hasFirstHorseCrossedTheFinishLine

        private boolean hasFirstHorseCrossedTheFinishLine
        Condition variable for the first pair Horse/Jockey to announce that has crossed the finish line.
        This is a condition variable of makeAMove(int) and it is reset on the makeAMove(int) method itself.

      • brokerDidNotOrderToStartTheRace

        private boolean brokerDidNotOrderToStartTheRace
        Condition variable for the Broker to order the race to start.
        This is a condition variable of proceedToStartLine() and it is reset on the hasFinishLineBeenCrossed(int) method.

      • raceIsAboutToEnd

        private boolean raceIsAboutToEnd
        Condition variable for noticing when a race is about to end.
        This is a condition variable of makeAMove(int).

      • repository

        private GeneralInformationRepository repository
        The GeneralInformationRepository instance where all this region's actions will be reported.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RacingTrack

        public RacingTrack​(Race race,
                   GeneralInformationRepository repository)
        Creates a Racing Track.
        This constructor creates a Racing Track giving a race. Plus, an instance of the repository is also given in order to report status changes on the course of its actions.
        Parameters:
        race - A race to be executed over this Racing Track.
        repository - An instance of a GeneralInformationRepository in order to report all the actions and log each and every moment.

    • Method Detail

      • proceedToStartLine

        public void proceedToStartLine​()
                        throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Changes the state of the pair Horse/Jockey to At the Start Line (ATSL) and waits till the last startTheRace() is performed by the Broker.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the wait() is interrupted.

      • makeAMove

        public void makeAMove​(int horseId)
               throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Let a pair Horse/Jockey horse make a move on the track, accordingly to its abilities to move.
        This methods waits till the makeAMove(int) of the last pair Horse/Jockey. Plus, it also notifies when the first pair Horse/Jockey has crossed the finish line.
        Parameters:
        horseId - the identification of the pair Horse/Jockey which wants to make a move.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the wait() is interrupted.

      • hasFinishLineBeenCrossed

        public boolean hasFinishLineBeenCrossed​(int horseJockeyId)
        Verification if the pair Horse/Jockey horse has crossed the finish line.
        This method reset the condition variable of proceedToStartLine().
        Parameters:
        horseJockeyId - the pair Horse/Jockey which we want to verify if had crossed the finish line.
        Returns:
        true if the pair Horse/Jockey had crossed the finish line; otherwise it will return false.

      • startTheRace

        public void startTheRace​()
        Signal that the race is about to start, by the Broker performing its job.
        Note that this method changes the value of the condition variable to the proceedToStartLine() wait condition, notifying its changes.

      • getRace

        public Race getRace​()
        Gets the current Race happening on this Racing Track.
        Returns:
        the Race of this Racing Track.

      • getWinner

        public int getWinner​()
        Gets the current winner of a race on this Racing Track.
        Returns:
        the current winner as the identification of a pair Horse/Jockey; otherwise -1 if the race is not over yet.

      • markFinalPosition

        private void markFinalPosition​(int horse)
        Marks the final position of the pair Horse/Jockey identified with horse.
        Parameters:
        horse - the identification of the pair Horse/Jockey which has finished its race.
